headline: Warner Bros. Discovery Announces the Pricing Terms of Previously Announced Cash Tender Offers
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. ("Warner Bros. Discovery" or the "Company") today announced the pricing terms of the previously announced tender offers (the "Offers") by its wholly-owned subsidiaries, Discovery Communications, LLC ("DCL"), WarnerMedia Holdings, Inc. ("WMH"), Warner Media, LLC ("WML") and Historic TW, Inc. ("TWI" and, together with DCL, WMH and WML, the "Issuers"), to purchase for cash substantially all of their outstanding notes and debentures (collectively, the "Notes"). Capitaliz
